official_title: Pilot Trial to Examine the Effect of Ginger on the Gut Microbiome (GINGER)
inclusion_criteria:
* Colorectal adenoma diagnosis
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Allergy or sensitivity to ginger
* Active cancer
* Unstable medical condition
* Unstable diet or weight
